promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young special dragonfly fighting-type pokemon with a red and black crystal core. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or dragonfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystinsecta, a a chibi young special dragonfly fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Submission. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragonfly", "fighting" or "Crystinsecta". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, dragonfly-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This chibi warrior flutterbug uses its dazzling gem-like wings to outshine rivals. Often found testing its might deep within rocky canyons.
